algorithm_technique: Max-heap to explore subsequence sums by iteratively subtracting smallest absolute values.
problem_summary_simple: Find the k-th largest sum of any subsequence of an array.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a max-heap to efficiently explore subsequence sums, starting from the total sum of positive elements.
time_complexity: O(n log n + k log k)
key_insights: The largest subsequence sum is the sum of all positive numbers.
To find smaller sums, we can subtract the smallest absolute values from larger sums.
A max-heap is suitable for keeping track of the largest sums encountered so far.
